decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s):  001 - Location Plan; 01 REV - Ground Floor Plan as Existing; 02 REV - First Floor Plan as Existing; 03 REV - Roof Plan & Site Plan as Existing; 04 REV - Section AA as Existing; 05 REV Rear / West Elevation as Existing; 06 REV - Front Elevation as Existing; 11 REV - Ground Floor Plan as Proposed; 13 REV Roof Plan & Site Plan as Proposed; 14 REV - Section AA and Flank Elevation as Proposed; 15 REV - Rear / West Elevation as Proposed; 16 REV - Front Elevation as Proposed; 17 REV Garden Room as Proposed
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
| No part of the roof of the extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason:  To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies D4 and D6 of The London Plan (2021), polices 7.4, 7A & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and polices 1.1 (e)(g), 1.2 (f), 2.1(c) and 2.10 Core Strategy (2012). | The detached outbuilding hereby approved shall be used only for domestic purposes incidental to the dwelling on this site, and shall not be used for separate habitable accommodation, letting or any commercial use. No cooking or kitchen facilities shall be installed at any time.

Reason: To ensure that the development does not detract from the amenity of the adjoining properties, and to enable the Local Planning Authority to retain control over the use of the building in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Development Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3, D4 and D6 of the London Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
description:
Single storey rear extension with associated sliding doors and rooflight; Single storey detached garden outbuilding ,
photovoltaic panels to the roof of the garden room and house.
